translations: 颠覆，破坏；腐蚀，使道德败坏

sentences.sentence: Latest evidence of subtle interactions between earthquakes may subvert this assumption, however.
sentences.translation: 然而，关于地震之间微妙的相互作用的最新证据可能颠覆这一假设。

sentences.sentence: Others believe it will subvert relations within the family; cynics dubbed it the "Sue Your Son" law.
sentences.translation: 另外一些人认为这会破坏家庭关系；愤世嫉俗者称之为 “起诉你儿子” 的法律。

sentences.sentence: But the elite wants to subvert it.
sentences.translation: 但国家的精英人士想要毁灭这些成就。
